reviewText: As beginners we found this is very useful. Nice detail and camera angles helped to clarify the details

As an introduction to the sport this is an excellent video. I was a little put off that it did not contain any real exercises that I could use to improve with. The camera work is very good, the audio is great, and they make great use of multiple angles so you can really see what is going on. I definitely recommend it for someone just starting out.
Found this really useful! Broke techniques down into simple parts even I could understand :) would recommend to any newbie.
